lead_paragraph: Sam Bradford wrapped up his first season with Minnesota with three first-half touchdown passes and an NFL record, leading the Vikings to a 38-10 victory over the Chicago Bears on Sunday to finish on a winning note after tumbling out of contention over the last two months.
snippet: Sam Bradford wrapped up his first season with Minnesota with three first-half touchdown passes and an NFL record, leading the Vikings to a 38-10 victory over the Chicago Bears on Sunday to finish on a winning note after tumbling out of contention ...

headline.main: Bradford, Vikings Blow Out Bears 38-10 in Finale
headline.print_headline: Bradford, Vikings Blow Out Bears 38-10 in Finale
